name: mail-archiver
description: Mail Archiver is a small self-hosted solution that captures and archives emails for permanent searchable storage. It supports IMAP fetching and full-text search for compliance or personal records.
features: IMAP fetching: Automatically retrieve and archive emails from multiple IMAP accounts.
Full-text search: Search archived messages by subject, sender, content, or attachment names.
Retention policies: Configure automatic archival rules based on age, folder, or sender criteria.
Attachment storage: Extract and store email attachments separately for efficient file management.
Export options: Export archived emails in standard formats like MBOX or EML for portability.
Compliance support: Meet regulatory requirements with tamper-proof archival and audit trails.
Deduplication: Automatically detect and eliminate duplicate messages to save storage space.
Advanced filtering: Create custom rules to archive only specific emails based on multiple criteria.
Web interface: Browse and search archived emails through a clean, responsive web UI.
Scheduled archiving: Set up automatic archival jobs to run at specified intervals.
